Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
FilesSectionName_Description: Title of Files section in Mobile Apps tab of Settings screen
ShowFilesAndroidApp_Description: If true, display a link to Aurora Files for Android
ShowFilesServerUrlApp_Description: If true, display URL which needs to be supplied in mobile apps to access files
FilesAndroidAppLink_Description: URL of a link to Aurora Files for Android
ShowFilesIosApp_Description: If true, display a link to Aurora Files for iOS
FilesIosAppLink_Description: URL of a link to Aurora Files for iOS
ShowFilesWinApp_Description: If true, link to Windows client for accessing files is shown
FilesWinAppLink_Description: URL of a link to Windows client for accessing files
MailSectionName_Description: Title of Mail section in Mobile Apps tab of Settings screen
ShowMailServerUrlApp_Description: If true, display the URL for accessing this product installation
ShowMailAndroidApp_Description: If true, display a link to Aurora Mail for Android
MailAndroidAppLink_Description: URL of a link to Aurora Mail for Android
ShowMailIosApp_Description: If true, display a link to Aurora Mail for iOS
MailIosAppLink_Description: URL of a link to Aurora Mail for iOS
